context: Take-Two acquired Zynga in 2022 for $12.7B, becoming a mobile gaming leader. The company is developing GTA VI expected in 2025, its biggest release ever.

competitors.name: Activision Blizzard (Microsoft)
competitors.notes: Now Microsoft-owned, Call of Duty franchise

competitors.name: Electronic Arts
competitors.notes: Sports games and live service competitor

competitors.name: Tencent
competitors.notes: Massive gaming company with global reach
